DOC.HEADLINE: FOUR-STAR FILMS ; ' WHITE_HEAT '
DOC.TEXT: This is the fast-moving gangster classic written by Ivan Goff and Ben Roberts from a Virginia Kellogg story . Director Raoul Walsh gets_away with placing migraine-prone mobster James Cagney ( pictured ) on his mother ' s lap without a trace of self-consciousness ; never was an Oedipus_complex presented with so little fuss . This 1949 Warners production , which co-stars Virginia Mayo ( pictured ) and Edmond O ' Brien , is even more famous fo Cagney ' s ironic tag_line : " Top of the world , Ma ! " ( TMC Sunday at 7:30 a.m. , Cinemax Tuesday at 6:30 a.m. ) . Other four-star films airing this week : Unfaithfully Yours ( 1948 version ) Cinemax , Wednesday , 9 a.m. America , America AMC , Wednesday , 8 p.m. All the President ' s Men KCOP , Thursday , 2:30 a.m. Death in Venice Bravo , Thursday , 7:35 p.m. , Friday at midnight and 2 p.m. Kevin Thomas
